content: beginner hat is worked in one piece in the round on 8mm set of 5 double pointed knitting needles if you prefer you can work the hat on a 16 in 40 5 cm long circular needle then change to double pointed needles to work the last round lion brand® wool-ease® thick & quick® art #640 610 hudson bay 1 ball 9 stitches = about 4 in 10 cm over stockinette stitch worked in the round knit every round be sure to check your gauge also here https //www lionbrand com/products/simple-hat-l70300
